alert.note: Alert for Chouteau; Fergus; Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 11:15PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Judith Basin, central Fergus, and southeastern Chouteau Counties through 1215 AM MDT... At 1113 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Geraldine to 12 miles northwest of Denton to 7 miles north of Hobson. Movement was east northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Geraldine, Denton, Hobson, Winifred, Roy, Fergus, Moccasin, Danvers, Coffee Creek, Suffolk, Square Butte, Judith Landing, Hilger, Christina, Iliad and Benchland. This includes the following highways... Highway 200 between mile markers 50 and 76. Highway 191 between mile markers 2 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
